However, Although it is an old guitar, I think that the scratch is little on the body. It keeps Excellent condition. It was manufactured in early 2000s. Mr Zakk Wylde and Mr Steve Vai use Sustainer. Many other famous guitar players are using sustainer. SUSTAINER is very interesting!! 100% perfect working with 2 mode sustainer system. The sound continues to sustain until the remaining battery level becomes zero. For more information on sustainer, please refer to Fernandes's website. Sound variation is Wealthy ! When I get this guitar all the time, I go crazy and play. It is made in Korea, but very popular in japan. About guitar play, Current state, the space between the strings and the frets is standard. And, remaining amount of the Frets are many. Overall averaging, the remaining amount is about 95%. Thanks to that, I feel very easy to play the guitar. The Pickups gives very good distortion sound and clean sound. Burny is GREAT !! It is cleanliness. I polished with guitar exclusive polish, so it is in a very clean state. I after the finger board cleaning, painted beeswax. The aim is moisturizing and and protection. Current neck condition, very good ! roughly straight ! There is no problem with the Truss rod and it can be adjusted. Remaining Frets are 95% on average. You can play immediately after it is delivered to you. Guitar playing, is comfortable.
